subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Andrew Strauss said he was retiring from professional cricket after his team lost its series, and the No. 1 ranking, to South Africa. Alastair Cook will replace him as captain.
snippet: Andrew Strauss said he was retiring from professional cricket after his team lost its series, and the No. 1 ranking, to South Africa. Alastair Cook will replace him as captain.
